quote: when you make mistakes,take your time to make corrections;that which helps in building up your INTELLIGIENCE but when you compromise in making corrections,you may end up being a FAILURE
quote_letters: WHEN YOU MAKE MISTAKESTAKE YOUR TIME TO MAKE CORRECTIONSTHAT WHICH HELPS IN BUILDING UP YOUR INTELLIGIENCE BUT WHEN YOU COMPROMISE IN MAKING CORRECTIONSYOU MAY END UP BEING A FAILURE
